casebody.data:
U.S. BANK NATIONAL ASSOCIATION as Trustee
v.
Claude M. BROUILLARD et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 2, 2017

Mei-wa Cheng, self-represented, in support of the petition.

David M. Bizar, in opposition.

*1051The petition by the defendants Claude Brouillard and Mei-wa Cheng for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 173 Conn.App. 904, 163 A.3d 89 (2017), is denied.
